    • v2

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="2.0.0-RC5") public static HpoDiseaseLoader v2(Ontology hpo, HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions options)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use defaultLoader(MinimalOntology, HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions) instead.
      Get HpoDiseaseLoader that does not use deprecated APIs and is, therefore, faster than defaultLoader(MinimalOntology, HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions).
      Parameters:
      hpo - HPO ontology.
      options - loader options. Note: the default options are at HpoDiseaseLoaderOptions.defaultOptions()).
      Returns:
      v2 disease loader.
